headline: Baker Hughes to Supply Liquefaction Equipment for Commonwealth LNG Export Project
summary: Award from Technip Energies covers 6 mixed refrigerant turbomachinery trains for LNG production in Cameron, LouisianaLM9000 gas turbines paired with centrifugal compressors to deliver high efficiency, reliability, and lower carbon intensityOrder builds on strategic agreement between Commonwealth LNG and Baker Hughes for advanced equipment, services, and digital solutions HOUSTON and LONDON, Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Baker Hughes (NASDAQ: BKR), an energy technology company, announced Mond

headline: UBS, Citi Raise Baker Hughes (BKR) Targets Ahead of Energy Recovery
summary: Baker Hughes Company (NASDAQ:BKR) is one of the best hydrogen stocks to buy right now. On December 12, UBS raised the price target for Baker Hughes Company (NASDAQ:BKR) to $54 from $48 while keeping a Neutral rating on the shares. UBS stated that the change reflects a broader positive outlook for the Energy sector heading […]
